directions: Place bananas, kiwis, pears, and tangerine in a food processor; process until very smooth. Add lemon juice and blend until smooth. Add infant cereal, 1 tablespoon at a time, until baby food reaches desired thickness.
Scoop 1/3 to 1/2 cup baby food into sandwich-size resealable bags. Squeeze excess air out of bag and seal. Flatten bags and store in freezer.
ingredients: 3 very ripe pears, peeled and cored
1/4 cup infant rice cereal, or as desired
title: Homemade Fruit Medley Baby Food
